name: ORD_LDA_LINK_AUDIT
description: Audit table for links between the Order and LDAs.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The order ID. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: ORDER_ID

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line in the chronicles item. This is extracted from the LINE_COUNT column.

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_ID
columns.description: Audit trail for Line/Drain/Airway (LDA) ID. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_ID

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_PORT_C_NAME
columns.description: Audit trail for Line/Drain/Airway (LDA) Port. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_PORT_C

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_INSTLK_TM
columns.description: Audit trail for the line linkage instant. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_INST_LINK

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_COMMENT
columns.description: Audit trail of the comment for the line linkage. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_COMMENT

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_INSTRC_TM
columns.description: Audit trail for the instant the line link was recorded. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_INST_REC

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_USER_ID
columns.description: Audit trail of the user that recorded the line linkage. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_USER_ID

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: AUDIT_LDA_EDITED
columns.description: The line that was edited to create this entry in the audit trail. KB SQL Table: AUDIT_LDA_LINK KB SQL Column: AUDIT_LDA_EDITED

columns.name: AUDIT_ENC_CSN
columns.description: The audit trail of the encounter identifier that the Line/Drain/Airway (LDA) link was documented from.
